channel.title: How to make a npc walk around a bit,and make them att you when you come near
channel.description:
hey all my npc's dont move, any1 know how to make them walk around lots and make them att you when you come near them..i wana make my wild have like all the npc's rs has..and i need my mnsters to be agresive..so plz post a tut..or just tell me quickly.
o and also if any1 know how to make a area only 1 on 1 not multi?

item.title: How to make a npc walk around a bit,and make them att you when you come near
item.dc:creator: @SmokeSome SmokeSome
item.description:
@SmokeSome wrote:

that’s telling you where to post tutorials and not to request tutorials there. anyways i’ll let it drop. he’s been helped. im out.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a npc walk around a bit,and make them att you when you come near

item.title: How to make a npc walk around a bit,and make them att you when you come near
item.dc:creator: @pies pies
item.description:
@pies wrote:

It says next to the information of the Tutorial section that you aren’t allowed to request tutorials…

RS2 Server Tutorials ALL RS2 server tutorials and code goes here. --> DO NOT REQUEST TUTORIALS <--

Also, I found this for you, mrx229: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,201166.0.html

It shows you how to make an NPC walk around

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a npc walk around a bit,and make them att you when you come near

item.title: How to make a npc walk around a bit,and make them att you when you come near
item.dc:creator: @SmokeSome SmokeSome
item.description:
@SmokeSome wrote:

pies:

[quote]so plz post a tut…or just tell me quickly.

You aren’t allowed to request tutorials. If there isn’t one already then there isn’t much you can do.

:)[/quote]
isn’t it you cant request them in tutorial section but says nothing abou the help section…?

Read full topic
